Name: Block_Quotes
Carroll Gardens: ['Experience the charm of Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn! A traditionally Italian-American neighborhood, it is now dotted with lovely boutiques, shops and cafes, and yet has retained many of its long-standing family run businesses.', 'The neighborhood is family-oriented with several schools and playgrounds close by; there is also a neighborhood pool not too far. Fortunately, Carroll Gardens does not sacrifice its nightlife and social scene for its homely family vibe. Smith Street and Court Street have plenty of restaurants, coffee shops, bars, and shopping to choose from.']

Name: Lede
Carroll Gardens: Carroll Gardens has established itself as a Brooklyn favorite. Although flush with hip bars, boutiques, and restaurants, this neighborhood has never lost its old-NYC mystique. Quintessential brownstones line tree-trimmed sidewalks and local retailers and Italian eateries populate its cheerful main street. For a stroll or a stay, Carroll Gardens promises a healthy dose of Brooklyn's cool candor.

Name: Intro
Carroll Gardens: Carroll Gardens' brownstones, boutiques, and brunch spots are equal parts cool, calm, and collected.

Name: Photo_Captions
Carroll Gardens: ["A touch trendier than its neighbors, Boerum Hill and Cobble Hill, Carroll Gardens' brownstones, boutiques, and butcher shops lend the neighborhood a hip feel and an Italian flavor.", "Carroll Gardens's popular restaurants, pizzerias, and cafes lure you to gather for a meal with friends.", 'Although the neighborhood is undeniably urban, Carroll Gardens embraces the great outdoors.', "By foot or by bike, it's easy to get around in Carroll Gardens.", "People treat Carroll Gardens like the neighborhood it is. It's quite possible that you'll hear friendly chatter rather than honking horns."]
